item.title: How to Find Public Symbols That Can Be Internal Using Roslyn
item.description: I got a question about how to find all public symbols in a solution that can be internal. This is a common scenario when you want to reduce the visibility of your code to improve encapsulation. You can use Roslyn as a library to analyze the code in a solution and find such symbols. I've already written about how to use Roslyn as a library to analyze and rewrite code in a solution: .
